mapper.select: SELECT CORRNO, CR.STUDNO AS STUDNO, S.NAME AS STUDNAME, CR.COURSNO AS COURSO, CO.NAME AS COURSNAME, REASON, CR.STATUS corrStatus, CR.REGDATE AS REGDATE FROM TBL_CORRECTION CR JOIN TBL_COURSE CO ON CR.COURSNO = CO.COURSNO JOIN TBL_STUDENT S ON CR.STUDNO = S.STUDNO WHERE CORRNO = #{corrno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CORRECTION(CORRNO, STUDNO, COURSNO, REASON, PROFNO) VALUES (SEQ_CORRECTION.NEXTVAL, #{studno}, #{coursno}, #{reason}, #{profno})
